caption: Figure 1: (a) shows underestimation caused by unsuitable prompts in MMT-Bench, (b) shows our proposed evaluation framework resolving this by customizing prompts.
description: Figure 1 shows the underestimation problem caused by unsuitable prompts in the MMT-Bench benchmark and introduces the TP-Eval framework which solves this issue through prompt customization.

caption: Figure 2: The overview of our automatic prompt customization structure.
description: The figure illustrates the overall pipeline of TP-Eval, showing how the automatic prompt customization method obtains the optimal prompt for a given MLLM.
